description: Contains Home Health care plan problems noadd single items information.

columns.name: PROBLEM_ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the care plan problem.

columns.name: PROBLEM_TYPE_ID
columns.description: Care plan problem type (or interdisciplinary diagnosis) ID.  Links to category table MULT_DISC_DX.

columns.name: CREATE_DATE
columns.description: Date on which care plan problem was created.

columns.name: DELETE_DATE
columns.description: Date on which care plan problem was deleted.

columns.name: REASON_FOR_DEL_C_NAME
columns.description:
Reason for deleting problem.  Links to category table ZC_DEL_REASON.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: DISCIPLINE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Care plan problem discipline.  Links to category table ZC_DISCIPLINE.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: IP_DISCIPLINE_ID
columns.description: Care plan problem inpatient discipline.  Links to table DISCIPLINE.

columns.name: IP_DISCIPLINE_ID_DISC_NAME
columns.description: The name of the discipline record.

columns.name: GOAL_DESCR_ID
columns.description: Care plan problem goal description ID.

columns.name: INTERV_DESC_ID
columns.description: Care plan problem intervention description ID.

columns.name: OUTCOMES_DESC_ID
columns.description: Care plan problem outcomes description ID.
